description:
time: add RFC1123 with numeric timezone format

Fixes issue 841.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2a7d8203f19a ***

time: add RFC1123 with numeric timezone format

Fixes issue 841.

R=rsc, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5322058

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5322058/diff/7001/src/pkg/time/format.go
File src/pkg/time/format.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5322058/diff/7001/src/pkg/time/format.go#newcode48
src/pkg/time/format.go:48: // RFC822 with Zulu time.
Please delete and add comment to next line

RFC822Z = ... // RFC822 with numeric zone

Same format for new RFC1123Z.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5322058: time: add RFC1123 with numeric timezone format
